reviews.review_text: Oysters were best Ive had, fantastic clams, and great service overall. Highly recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Thomas, Love to hear this. Thank you for the review and recommendation.

reviews.review_text: We had a fabulous time here! The staff is so friendly and welcoming. The oysters are incredibly fresh and good quality. They also pour the wine to the very top of the glass, which is fun!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Alisha, We are so happy to hear you had fun! Thank you so much for the review.

reviews.review_text: This place is a  must ! Here, one can find delicious oysters, and the happiest Happy-Hour (complete with generous pours of wine)! All service members took excellent care of us, and the delightful conversation they fostered made us feel truly welcome.   My only regret was that my Husband & I didn t visit again for a full meal while on vacation in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Kimberly, Thank you for the fabulous review. We are so happy you enjoyed your time with us!

reviews.review_text: Top notch oyster joint! Super friendly and attentive staff. The oysters were amazing and I tried the scallops. Probably the best scallops Ive ever had out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Morvis, We love to hear this.  Thank you so much for the positive review!

reviews.review_text: We have been to Rodneys more than once ...(we are not from Vancouver) the service is always great along with the food..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Asap Jun, Great to hear this! Thank you for the review.

reviews.review_text: Charlie, Bobby and Chris made our bar experience phenomenal! The food and drinks were great and the interactions with staff were next level! Amazing experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Bronwen, Thank you for the awesome review! So happy you enjoyed your experience with us.

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and super friendly and knowledgeable servers! Will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Daria, Thank you for the positive review. See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We didnt even notice how Rodneys Gastown location turned in one of our favorites in town. Before, we mainly went to Fanny Bay to feed the craving for oysters but decided to try Rodneys one day, and theres no coming back. Upon our first arrival, the place was bustling, and we were seated at the bar, which was something new for us at an oyster joint. Jumping ahead, I can tell that the bar seating is the only one we accept visiting Rodneys since then. At first, I was a bit irritated with the service but turned out we came there right at the change of shifts, and everything was fixed pretty quickly. Ive heard from many people that they dont like the atmosphere here because the staff reminds them of a fraternity. I have to disagree with that. I think that the mood created by the team with their witty behavior and high energy creates one of a kind experience no one else can offer. Thats why seating at the bar is the best spot available if you ask me. After all, I dont find oysters to be fancy food like many dining places trying to make it, so I think that a more straightforward and friendlier atmosphere suits it much better. The variety of oysters is pretty amazing, and its always the freshest and best product out there. And its hard to beat their Low Tide deals for oysters and drinks. I encourage people to try Rodneys because this place is absolutely spectacular.

Amazing food and oysters.  Our host even walked me through the process of shucking.  Had a great wine and dinner with friends. Great recommendations for continuing the evenings shenanigans.  Amazing evening!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Gabriel, Thank you for the awesome review. So happy you had a great time!

reviews.review_text: Great place. Casual vibe. Fantastic oysters. The host, Miguel, accomodated 10 of us with only a last minute reservation (by phone   don t use the app). Mina was the best waitress ever. Efficient, good recommendations, very nice. Our group had a great evening.
Great food and great service.  Very fresh oysters but also try their Manhattan Claim Chowder and Seafood Salad.

Excellent service and outstanding oysters. We asked for West coast oysters and enjoyed trying the different options while taking with the guys behind the bar. The staff take pride in their jobs and enjoyed discussing shucking, different types of oysters, and even how the chowder pots work. Prices are in-line for high quality seafood. Its a lively, noisy restaurant, but we didnt have trouble hearing each other over the music and other customers. It is a relatively small restaurant, so reservations are probably a good idea. We sat at the bar without a reservation on a Saturday afternoon, but even that filled up quickly while we were there.

5 stars are not enough. Great staff (positive-meniscus-Bobby and positive-energy-Amanda), and a buzzy vibe. Oysters, oysters and more oysters, natural and as shots (so delicious!). The most fun. Thank you! #willbeback
Came in for drinks and appies and was immediately greeted by Chris who was awesome from start to finish. Oysters fresh and drinks prompt! A must-visit in gastown.

I dont know where to start! The Oysters were amazing and their wide variety of sauces were amazing! We ordered the Lobster Poutine and the New England Clam chowder and wish we wouldve ordered more! it was so delicious!

what can i say! really fresh oysters with a wide variety of sauces to choose from! the staff was patient and kind enough to tell us where each oysters are from and gave some good recommendations. We also tried the clam soup(both red&white) and they were amazing as well! overall sucha great experience, great time, great staff

Very fresh oysters and delicious new england clam soup. The tomato clam soup is okay but a bit too herbalic for my taste. The service is fast and helpful. It was our first time so I asked them for suggestion on the oysters like how many is ideal and which types etc. and he was professional from beginning to end.

Best oysters, amazing steamed mussels, strong wine pours and hilariously entertaining bar staff. I highly recommend Rodneys and I suggest you grab a seat at the bar. Delicious dinner, fresh seafood and good company.
Always a good time. Finally got to use my gift card. Sad my gift card is maxed out but looking forward to returning sometime soon
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Donna, Thank you so much for the review. Can t wait to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Was a super fun night. Food was great. Servers were awesome. I was hoping to have a lobster night with the boys but they only had one lobster available. Made the best of it though, and ordered a few steaks to go with the one lobster. They put it all on a cool platter and everyone loved it. We had lots of appetizers so we were all full by the end.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Graham! I m so sorry about the lack of lobsters! I wasn t there when you guys came in but I heard all about it. Next time let me know and I ll ENSURE there s enough for you all. Glad you had a nice time regardless! Thanks for coming in :) ~Lou

reviews.review_text: Fresh Oysters and seafood in town ! Although the oyster is a bit small but it is very creamy and sweet ! Soup is nice, mussels are nice, the only down side is the scallops linguini is too soaked. Lovely service !

I love this spot! Bobby, Charlie and Chris are exceptional. They always greet you and check in throughout the experience. Exceptional service every time. The kitchen create amazing dishes that you find yourself ordering way more than one item on the menu. Great value. A destination spot for any Vancouver foodie. Cheers friends.
We had an awesome experience at Rodneys! Oysters were perfect, great vibe, our waiter Michael was super friendly and funny. Recommend 150%! Enjoy
Weordered Oyster & Lobster +Shrimp sliders. Very delicious
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Parisa, So happy you enjoyed the tasty fare. Thank you for the wonderful review.

reviews.review_text: The lobster roll is bar none the best thing Ive ever eaten in the entire world. I cant even begin to describe it. If it ever leaves the menu I will host a funeral. If each roll took a year off my life and they had a cocktail menu I would die by the end of the week.

Wow! Can I move this place with me to Scotland?! I wish I could. The food was exceptional,  the quality of oysters was excellent, and the service, including the knowledge and passion of the staff, is very visible. Atmosphere is electric! I also tried my first cesars here. I loved it. Thanks for fabulous time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Peter, Thank you for the wonderful review! We love to hear this. So happy you had a great time with us.

reviews.review_text: The food was incredible only to be out shined by the service. Huge raves to Jordan and Peter
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Liz, Fantastic to hear such kind words about the crew and fare!

reviews.review_text: My boyfriend and I had a really great time in Rodneys oyster house, good service and amazing food, oyster is pretty fresh! We had a good experience here, we will differently come again :)

One of the best oyster house in town. Fresh! Cheerful atmosphere. Service was outstanding. Well worth the wait. Bring a partner and just share time in line. One of you can gamble while the other holds your spot in line. Definitely best seafood and oysters! Can t wait to go back!

Wow!  What a fabulous place!  I loved the atmosphere and the friendly staff. I came here at 9:30 on a Saturday night and sat at the bar. I had a great time chatting with the staff and they recommended oysters and wine for me. Lovely experience I will gladly be back.
Sat at the bar with Mckenzie yesterday for some wine and oysters! We had such a fun time and the environment was great ! The oysters were out of this world but the service is what we really loved !
Sat at the bar and had a great time with the staff. They made sure we were taken care of and gave fantastic recommendations for dinner and what to do next with our night.
Never been here before so I cant vouch for the food or atmosphere but my friend had a great experience here.

Recommend by the Airbnb super host so decided to give it a try. You immediately feel welcomed by the staff and everyone working there was friendly. Alex, helped me choose my dish, fish and oysters and it was definitely a memorable time. Highly recommend it!
yum!!! Best spot for oysters. Also super fun that they put wine in a normal glass. They have lots of home made sauces to add to the oysters, hope you like spicy!! Get the Solomol oysters!
Had a great time here the other night.  Nate did a fantastic job in taking care of us.  Cant wait to go back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Ivan Thank you for the fabulous review. We look forward to seeing you soon!

reviews.review_text: My sister and I took a girls trip to Vancouver and found ourselves at Rodney s Oyster House. The vibe was awesome, staff friendly and very helpful as we had never had fresh oysters! All around a very cool experience!

It was great experience. Even I cant eat oyster, there prawn menu fresh and good taste. Potion is bit small though. But there staffs are super friendly, cute and make me feel so comfortable. High recommend!
Warm, energetic atmosphere. Ordered oysters, scallop pasta and shrimp curry. All were delicious and the service was quick. Especially like the half portion option so we had room for more choices.

Not a single bad word to say about the experience eating at Rodney s. The food was amazing, super fresh and full of flavour. The service was great with a knowledgeable waitress explaining the origins of their oysters and how it affects their flavour, making a small platter of different oysters for us to try. The special scallop starter was one of the nicest things I ve ever tasted, prices are reasonable considering the quality of the food and service. I highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Joe, We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for the review and recommendation.

reviews.review_text: Great place,fast service,amazing customer service,food was delicious.very busy and is loud so if you are looking for calm romantic corner,is not for you.we really enjoyed our evening though
High quality oysters and funny servers. Love this hidden place in gas town
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Leo, Thank you for the positive feedback! We look forward to hosting you again soon, Fair sails

reviews.review_text: We sat at the Bar tonight and Chris (or Kris) is so awesome! Phenomenal service, tasty food and lovely atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Amanda, Thank you so much for the amazing review. We can t wait to have you back!

reviews.review_text: Amazing service, amazing food. Staff were above and beyond on hospitality and the menu offerings were delicious! Well done to the kitchen! Great server as well and took excellent care of our table!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Kris, Thank you for the positive review.  We are so happy you enjoyed our hospitality and menu.

reviews.review_text: I had an amazing experience at this location tonight.  The staff is amazing and accommodating.  I love the Rodneys Pour for wine! This is by far the best location for staff accommodation,  the best oyters, and by far the best atmosphere.  The manager Chris made sure that our table was taken care of our entire time. We will definitely be back to this location, a great experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Racheal, Thank you so much for the review!  We can t wait to host you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great staff and atmosphere! Their in-house hot sauce selection is awesome, and their Low Tide (happy hour) menu is fantastic - $1.50 oysters were really fresh.
Friendly staff and great deals. We enjoyed oysters during low tide hours with beers and ceasars.

The food was amazing, the service was also professional and friendly. Especially shout out to Peter who was our lovely server, thanks a lot for being so nice guys. (thanks for letting us dance with our turkish song as well!) Go go go everyone and enjoy your day in peace
Great food Low tide price friendly staff (ordered 3 glasses of house wine and got the whole bottle!) Coconut shrimp is a must try!
Freshness counts, atmosphere counts with service and a smile. Great food gets me all the time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Andy, Thank you for the kind words!

reviews.review_text: Our server was the best! Top notch experience Food was absolutely delicious Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Anastasiia, Thank you so much for the review.

reviews.review_text: We loved everything about the place. The staff was exceptional!! They were a really fun bunch of guys that made us feel so welcomed. Excellent oysters along with the ambiance. We are going back one more time before we leave to go home.
Went for the low tide happy hour and was great. The oysters were amazing and the staff were super nice.

One of the best meals we ve had in a long time. Scallop pasta was so good, I ordered another plate of just scallops, which they happily accommodated. The garlic prawns were amazing, especially the broth they come in which they give you bread to soak up with. Service was great, and the  low tide  happy hour on the oysters was a pleasant surprise as they were relatively inexpensive for tasty oysters.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Tanner, Thank you so much for the kind words. Very happy that you enjoyed your time at Rodney s. See you next time, fair sails!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely worth the nearly 200$ we spent here. The super tall gentleman serving us was lovely! Food was fresh, tasty, and beautifully presented. Loved the ambience and totally would come back/recommend to others. 10/10! We got fresh oysters, crab cakes, jalapeno shrimp, bam bam shrimp, crab legs, and lobster rolls.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Lacky, Great to hear you loved it! Thank you

reviews.review_text: Our server, Charlie, was really great. Food was fresh and tasty. We had the crab cakes, shrimp cocktail and calamari to start and then scallop pasta, clams, lobster poutine and the lobster shrimp rolls for round two. Sprinkled in a dozen oysters throughout the evening as well. No complaints about anything. Music was awesome, we were checked on by other staff members as well. We can t wait to go back and try more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Melissa, Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We look forward to hosting you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Top notch service, food and music from Mina and crew at Rodneys! Great food and music. Kudos to Mina for the stellar accomodation!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Kris, Thank you for the awesome Review!

reviews.review_text: My favourite restaurant whilst visiting Vancouver for 4 days. We had some oysters, clam chowder. seafood linguine and halibut. All delicious! And to finish their cinnamon bun cheesecake was incredible too. Great service and super friendly atmosphere. Definitely recommend a visit!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Ciska, We are so happy you enjoyed your time with us! See you again soon

reviews.review_text: 100% must visit if you like a fun crew and delicious food!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Janet, We love hearing this. Thank you so much!

reviews.review_text: Cool and quirky setting, casual atmosphere. Our table was ready within a few minutes. We had BC oysters to start and they were amazing. The kitchen was missing a cook, orders were backed-up and hot food took longer to come out. However, our server Fox, and Manager Lou  came by and made sure were were kept informed, and made us feel so well taken care of we did not mind the wait. They knew how to recover the situation and turned what could have been a long wait into a very positive experience. They were fun, positive, and very professional. And when we did get our pan fried oysters, they were more than worth the wait! Chef came by and we had nothing but compliments for him. A most pleasant experience, will be back next time we are in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So great to see you two again on Friday! Thanks again for stopping in and being SUCH lovely guests. See you next time you re in town!

reviews.review_text: Excellent waiter!  Excellent food!!  We would come again in a heart beat!
Food is fresh and delicious! The place is cozy and service is good.
Love their food! Awesome atmosphere and service.
Great conversation with the guys at the oyster bar, very cool experience and the oysters are great! Also try the clam chowder!
Casual atmosphere, lovely food, ordered a Chef Favourite :Lobster pasta which is lovely Friendly service and the restaurant is packed Strongly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Trent. Thank you for the positive review. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely outstanding! We ordered the clams, and the wait staff accidentally brought out mussels. Without is even mentioning anything, our waiter realized and calmly put the mussels on the house while fixing up our original order. Both dishes were great (though the free mussels were far superior). The seafood linguine was still the highlight of the night! All the food arrived very very quickly, and everything was delicious!
I can sum up the experience in five succinct but eloquent points: 1. Crab 2. Crab 3. Crab 4. Crab 5. Crab Also Bobby and Chris were okay I guess.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Don, Thank you for the eloquent review! Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Perfect place for girls night out. Make sure you sit on the bars. It s really fun and they have the best oyster. Make sure you order dozens of oyster and pasta with scallops. And again thank you for make my night wonderful.
Excellent food, very friendly staff and cosy atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy CB Thank you for the review. Look forward to seeing you again!

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and a great atmosphere. Tons of different stuff to try and decent beer specials too. Try the lobster poutine.

Excellent! Fresh oysters, delicious clam chowder, crab cakes, fish and chips. Interesting beers. Great cheesecake. Above all   very good service and great prices. Highly recommend. Might want to make reservations or go there for early dinner.

I am a big fan of Rodneys Yaletown and was excited to check out Rodneys Gastown on my latest visit to Vancouver. They did not disappoint. I was in for Low Tide and enjoyed some oysters and a yummy new shrimp appetizer they had just introduced (it wasnt on the menu yet). The service was excellent.

This was absolutely wonderful.  Had a large group and we all had such an amazing time.  Food was amazing, services was top notch. If your a person who loves seafood and a good night out you don t have to look any further. If you have the chance to have Mike as your server, sit back and enjoy! We will all be back again.
Been in Canada for 3 weeks for vacation and this was the best meal of the trip. Calamari, steamed clams, and seafood pasta were all top notch. Get here before 6pm for oysters at  low-tide  prices.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Min, Thank you for the positive feedback on your Rodney s experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Fair sails

reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere, great food and love both oysters & the manhattan clams!

My cousins and I went her a couple weeks ago and I just have to say best service, best food, and great environment! Are serve Mina was very kind, did not hesitate to answer any questions and overall made our experience there amazing. Will definitely be returning and recommend others as well!

Crisp pints.  Excellent chowder.  An institution with a worthy reputation. The team here really knows how to run the operation and every visit feels special. Kitchen has high standards; every time I eat here the food is on point. Great time.  10/10 recommend.  They wont leave you disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Jason, happy to hear about your positive experience. Hope to see you again soon! Fair Winds!

reviews.review_text: Excellent service here. The staff was very accommodating even though we had two small children who didnt know how to behave. They definitely knew their oysters and had a variety of sauces to try. I would definitely come here again. However if you are not here during happy hour, the oysters are quite expensive.
Went for the first time last night and was extremely impressed! We sat at the bar and the staff were absolutely amazing! Oysters were fresh and super good! So much fun! 10/10 recommend

Good Seafood. Clam chowder lunch special, so good. Friendly staff provide a good atmosphere. I was taking friends engagement photos outside their door and they invited us in and got her to try oysters for the first time, on the house. It was really fun. Always a good experience.

Theyve managed to recreate the same atmosphere as their Yaletown shop, which is great. I always enjoy my visits to either Rodneys. The staff are friendly and the food and drink are good. Try make a reservation before you go though, it fills up fast especially at the weekends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Will. Thank you for the positive review. We look forward to hosting you again!

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend the lobster poutine! We had it, plus a huge plate off muscles, and oysters. All was very good. No drinks, but we had cheesecake as well - super good! With tip came to $75 for two. Service was excellent and great atmosphere. Food is good and good portions. We had to wait 45 minutes for a table, but just got a drink somewhere else in Gastown for that time and they called us, so good location generally for before/after drinks as well. We were able to find parking relatively easily less than 2 minutes away and it was also inexpensive. Would return!
We had a great time here tonight - the hostess had great energy and we enjoyed the service! The food was well presented and delicious too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Natalya, We are so glad you enjoyed your night with us. Thank you for the review!

reviews.review_text: $1.50 oysters during happy hours. 3pm to 5pm.
Greta food for a reasonable price. All the food is amazing!

Happy hour specials are the time to go! Good price for oysters and appies. Have had birthday parties there and service has been good even for larger groups. A must try is their deep fried oysters. Their Caesar s are also top notch.

Great happy hour, attentive service. will definitely be back update: came back, had another amazing experience! our server, Nathan, was funny, attentive and personable and even recommended a cool Speakeasy as our next place. 10/10 will come again
Fresh oysters and good variety of seafood dishes. Very welcoming and friendly staff!

Excellent service. Excellent food. Oysters were great, as was the seafood clubhouse. Great selection of hot sauces. Desserts were amazing as well. Overall a great experience. Will definitely be going back next time were in Vancouver.

Staff are amazing and hilarious. Very accommodating and great service. Pan-fried oysters are very good and the selection of raw oysters is quite good. 80s music played throughout 90% chance the servers and you will have a good time when in the air tonight by Phil Collins comes on. Definitely recommend coming out here.

The absolute best place for fresh oysters, hands down! The staff are so great and it is such a light, fun and welcoming environment to sit with friends or family. Top recommendation goes to this restaurant!

Amazing place with amazing seafood dishes. Oyster selection was great and fresh and had me dying for more. The ambience is great as well with awesome servers with great personality. I will definitely return once I save up my pennies.

One of the best places to shell out money. The staff is fun and full of spunk, the raw food is excellent. Cooked food isnt great, this isnt where you go for cooked food. Beer and drinks are great. The Rodneys Gas Town experience is one of my favorites and this is definitely my favorite Rodneys location.

Rodneys had such a great atmosphere, the food was fresh and delicious, and the service couldnt have been better! All the servers are engaging and energetic, browsing across the room you could see surprise and delights and smiles all around from happy customers - I highly recommend grabbing a bite and enjoying the company! Special shout out and thank you to our waiter Sherman! If you are reading this - yes, Global Entry grants you Nexus access - just need the physical card on hand! (Now I know for next time)

The food and servers were amazing here. They constantly checked on us and were great with our babies being there. I would recommend this place to everyone. The only downside is that you have to find parking on the street and Gastown can be a bit of a nightmare right now.
Good

Absolutely awesome. It was probably one of the best meals my wife and I have ever had; the food, the atmosphere, the banter from the servers - we absolutely loved every minute. We shared as many dishes as many dishes as we could manage, including desert and it was all just brilliant. One day when were back in BC, well 100% be back here.

Had a short wait (not a problem, we didnt have a reservation) Waiter and server were attentive and thorough. Coco Shrimp Curry and the Garlic Shrimp were very good. The restaurant was a little noisy as it was full and everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves - the music could have been turned down a bit. We would definitely return!
The oysters are so good and fresh!!! High recommend this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ahoy Arya! Thank you for dining with us! Fair Sails

reviews.review_text: Great food and personalised service!
